description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Fastos militares de iniquidad, barbarie y despotismo del gobierno español, ejecutados en las villas de Orizava y Córdoba en la guerra de once años, por causa de la independencia de la nacion mexicana ... Dalos a luz como documentos que apoyan las relaciones del Cuadro historico de la revolucion ... J. M. Tornel. [Edited by C. M. de Bustamante.]", "Appendix. History and Politics" Contributor: BUSTAMANTE, Carlos María de. Contributor: TORNEL Y MENDIVIL, José María - General Author: Spain Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9771.c.15." Page: 89 Place of Publishing: Mexico Date of Publishing: 1843 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003454897 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
